definition: sutra written on leaves of pattra palm tree
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Have you ever heard of palm-leaf scriptures?
What exactly are the palm-leaf scriptures?
Han Jia, what exactly are the palm-leaf scriptures you just mentioned?
sentences.chinese: 韓佳，你剛纔說的貝葉經到底是什麼呀？

sentences.english: Really? Then let's go take a look at how they carve a palm-leaf scripture.
sentences.chinese: 啊？那我們還是去看看他們是怎麼刻貝葉經的吧。

sentences.english: Pattra-leaf culture refers to the traditional culture of the Dai nationality with Pattra-leaf scriptures as the core.
sentences.chinese: 貝葉文化是指以貝葉經爲核心的傣族傳統文化。

sentences.english: Han Jia, are palm-leaf scriptures an important component of Palm-Leaf Culture?
sentences.chinese: 韓佳，貝葉經應該是貝葉文化的重要組成部分吧？

sentences.english: Do you also understand palm-leaf scriptures?
